tickets.title: Application crashes on startup
tickets.body: Every time I try to start the application, it crashes immediately and I get an error message that says 'Unexpected error occurred'. My operating system is macOS Big Sur.

tickets.title: Error when opening application
tickets.body: I'm encountering an error every time I attempt to launch the application. The error code is B123. I'm using the latest version of the software on my Windows 10 machine.

tickets.title: Website not responsive on mobile
tickets.body: When I view the website on my mobile device, the layout appears skewed and some buttons are not accessible. I'm using an iPhone 12 Pro with Safari browser.

tickets.title: Unable to install latest update
tickets.body: When I try to install the latest update, I receive an error message stating 'Installation failed. Please try again later.' I've attempted to install the update multiple times with no success.

tickets.title: Forgot password and can't reset
tickets.body: I have forgotten my password and when I try to reset it, I never receive the email with the reset link. I've checked my spam folder and it's not there either.

tickets.title: Forgot password and can't reset again!
tickets.body: I have forgotten my password again and when I try to reset it, I never receive the email with the reset link. I've checked my spam folder and it's not there either.
